reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 972: FEES FOR CERTIFICATES AND ORDERS
reg_info.act_under: Public Lands Act   Loi sur les terres publiques

content.content:
1. The following fees shall be paid:  1.

For a certificate issued under subsection 61 (4) of the Act as to the issue of letters patent for lands, mines or minerals 

$100.00


2.

For an order made under subsection 66 (1) of the Act releasing a reservation to the Crown 

500.00


3.

For an order made under subsection 66 (2) of the Act releasing a reservation of a right of access to the shores of rivers, streams and lakes 

500.00


4.

For an order made under subsection 66 (2) of the Act releasing a reservation of a right of way 

500.00


5.

For a certificate issued under subsection 69 (1) of the Act as to any condition, proviso or reservation that is void by statute 

100.00


6.

For a work permit 

50.00 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 972, s. 1; O. Reg. 335/93, s. 1.

1. The following fees shall be paid:

1.

For a certificate issued under subsection 61 (4) of the Act as to the issue of letters patent for lands, mines or minerals

$100.00

2.

For an order made under subsection 66 (1) of the Act releasing a reservation to the Crown

500.00

3.

For an order made under subsection 66 (2) of the Act releasing a reservation of a right of access to the shores of rivers, streams and lakes

500.00

4.

For an order made under subsection 66 (2) of the Act releasing a reservation of a right of way

500.00

5.

For a certificate issued under subsection 69 (1) of the Act as to any condition, proviso or reservation that is void by statute

100.00

6.

For a work permit

50.00

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 972, s. 1; O. Reg. 335/93, s. 1.
